Message.Title: Rigged Market
Message.Msg: Yesterday at 3:30 the Dow was up104. At 3:55 it wasup140 It closed up 172. The big boys had left forThanksgiving but had prgrammed their computers to go off. Today at3:55 the Dow was down 64 but in the last 5 minutes rallied 22 pts. This has been an ongoing pattern for a verylong time with rare exceptions. The market 50 years ago was a level playing field with 3 million shares traded Today it is a rigged game.

you're right.I meant to say "raise the earnings". Neverthelles, IBM might seem a bit risky based on the PE but many are not focusing on the PE but believe that the stock is worth the price and more as we've seen.
